  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String fullName, String username, String email, String phoneNo, String passwordHash, LocalDateTime DoB, String gender, String allergies, LocalDateTime dateOfAdmission)
      Constructs a new Patient with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the patient
      username - the username for the patient account
      email - the email address of the patient
      phoneNo - the phone number of the patient
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the patient account
      DoB - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      allergies - any known allergies of the patient
      dateOfAdmission - the date when the patient was admitted to the healthcare system

    • Patient

      public Patient(String UID, String fullName, String username, String email, String phoneNo, String passwordHash, LocalDateTime DoB, String gender, String role, String allergies, LocalDateTime dateOfAdmission)
      Constructs a new Patient with the specified details, primarily used when creating a Patient from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      UID - the unique identifier for the patient
      fullName - the full name of the patient
      username - the username for the patient account
      email - the email address of the patient
      phoneNo - the phone number of the patient
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the patient account
      DoB - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      role - the role of the patient (used for identifying patient records)
      allergies - any known allergies of the patient
      dateOfAdmission - the date when the patient was admitted to the healthcare system
